scripts.build: next build && next export && git add . && git commit -m "Add updated build"
scripts.copy-build-to-temp: cd .. && cp -a frontend-confessions-generator-from-template/out/. temp/ && echo "Copied build to temp" && pwd && cd frontend-confessions-generator-from-template/ && pwd && git switch gh-pages && pwd
scripts.deploy-gh-pages: npm run build && npm run copy-build-to-temp
